name: XmlTransformV1
description: This task facilitates XML file transformations within Azure DevOps pipelines.
author: dzhukovsky
helpMarkDown: For more information, refer to [XML Transform Task Documentation](https://github.com/dzhukovsky/xml-transform).

inputs.name: folderPath
inputs.label: Package or folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path to the package or a folder, wildcards are supported. For example, **/*.zip.

inputs.name: targetFiles
inputs.label: Target files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide new line separated list of files to substitute values. Files names are to be provided relative to the root folder.

inputs.name: overrides
inputs.label: Overrides
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide new line separated list of transformation rules using the syntax:
Example:
Single node syntax:
node1.childNode1 = value
node1.childNode1:attribute1 = value
[selector].childNode1 = value
[selector].childNode1:attribute1 = value

Multiple nodes syntax:
node1.childNode1:[0] = value
node1.childNode1:[0]:attribute1 = value
[selector].childNode1:[0] = value
[selector].childNode1:[0]:attribute1 = value

For more information, refer to [XML Transform Task Documentation](https://github.com/dzhukovsky/xml-transform#overrides).
